anya-e1214n0:6: Chanda’hānitthamo’kāraṃ-dhātvantānaṃ siyākva ci, yūnaṃ dīgho ca dhātumhā-pubbama’tthapadaṃ api.
anya-e1214n0:8: Bhū sattāyaṃ paca pāke gamusappa gatimhi (ca);
anya-e1214n0:12: Ku sadde kucchite ṭaṅka dhāraṇe maki maṇḍane.
anya-e1214n0:16: 4. Vava, lokanavittisu cakkhavutimhi (tu) rukkha (ca) khe thirahiṃsakhaṇe niya, mo’panayiṭṭhi vatādisa muṇḍisu dikkha (’tha) kakkha-kakhā hasane tura, hiṃsanavuddhigatīsu (hi) dakkha’danamhi (tu) jakkha (ca) bhakkha (matā) ana, jāladukhesu (tu) dikkha (ca) dukkha (ca) ikkha disa’ṅka na ko’kha suse.
anya-e1214n0:17: 5. [A] nikkha cumbane’(pi) sikkha vijju’pādu’ pāsānamhi rakkha guttivāraṇe (pi) uñchane (siyā’pi) bhikkha yāvaladdhya’laddhisū (pi) vakkha rosasaṃhatesu mokkha muttiyaṃ caje (pi) cikkha vācabodhanesu.
anya-e1214n0:18: [Ba] nakha makha rakha naṅkhāmaṅkharakkhī’khīlaṅkhā lakha vakha ikha iṅkhā uṅkha vaṅkhū’kha gatyaṃ vakhi makhi kakhi kaṅkhe khī khaye ukkha seke khu khutadhanisu (vutto) khe(’tha) khāde supe (ca.)
anya-e1214n0:21: Agī igī rigī ligī vagī gatya’tthadhātavo.
anya-e1214n0:23: Silāgha katthane jaggha hasane aggha agghane;
anya-e1214n0:26: Vaca byattavace yāca yācane ruca dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n0:27: Suca soke kuca sadde (atho) vica vivecane.
anya-e1214n0:33: Paca yāte kaci-vacca dittiyaṃ maci dhāraṇe.
anya-e1214n0:35: Puccha sampucchane muccha mohasmiṃ lañcha lakkhaṇe;
anya-e1214n0:38: Taccho tanukiraye piñcha piñchane rāja dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n0:42: Bhaja saṃsevane sañja saṅge (tu) iñja kampane.
anya-e1214n0:48: Majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ lajja lajjane tajja tajjane.
anya-e1214n0:51: Guja-kuja dvayaṃ sadde akhyatte khajja bhakkhaṇe.
anya-e1214n0:53: Bhajja pāke viji bhayacalane vīja vījane;
anya-e1214n0:54: Khajī gamanavekalle jī jaye ju jave (siyā;).
anya-e1214n0:56: Jhe cintāyujjha ussagge gamane aṭa-paṭa dvayaṃ;
anya-e1214n0:57: Naṭa nacce raṭa paribhāsane vaṭa veṭhane.
anya-e1214n0:59: Vaṭṭa āvattane vaṇṭa vaṇṭatthe kaṭa maddane;
anya-e1214n0:66: Ghaṭi saṅghaṭṭane taṭṭa cchedane muṭa maddane.
anya-e1214n0:68: Paṭha byattavace heṭha bādhāyaṃ veṭha veṭhane;
anya-e1214n0:75: Maṇḍa vibhūsane caṇḍa caṇḍikke bhaḍi bhaṅḍane.
anya-e1214n0:81: Kuḍi dāhe paḍi gate hiḍi āhiṇḍane (siyā;);
anya-e1214n0:87: Vaḍḍha saṃvaḍḍhane kaḍḍha kaḍḍhaṇe bhaṇa bhāsane;
anya-e1214n0:89: Soṇa vaṇṇe guṇa’bhyāse iṇa-pheṇa dvayaṃ gate,
anya-e1214n0:101: Gotthu vaṃse patha-pantha gate nanda samiddhiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n0:113: Madi balye muda-madā santose madda maddane;
anya-e1214n0:116: Vida lābhe dada dāne rudi assuvimocane;
anya-e1214n0:127: Dā dave du gatīvuddhayaṃ dā dāne vida jānane,
anya-e1214n0:128: Tadi ālasiye bādha bādhāyaṃ gudha kīḷane;
anya-e1214n0:133: Sidhu gatimhi yudha sampahāre vidha vedhane,
anya-e1214n0:136: Sidha-sādha (ca) siddhimhi dhe pāne indha dittiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n0:137: Māna pūjāya vana-sana sambhave ana pāṇane;
anya-e1214n0:140: Gupa gopanake gupa saṃvaraṇe tapa santāpe tapa issariye,
anya-e1214n0:141: Cupa mandagate tapuubbege rapa-lapa vākye sapa akkose;
anya-e1214n0:144: Kapi kiñcicale kappa sāmatthe vepu kampane;
anya-e1214n0:149: Capa sāntve pu pavane jhapa dāhe supo saye,
anya-e1214n0:153: Amba sadde (ca) assāde tāyane sabi maṇḍane;
anya-e1214n0:158: Labha lābhe jambha gattavināme subha sobhane,
anya-e1214n0:159: Bhī bhaye rabha rābhasse (cā)’rambhe khubha sañcale;
anya-e1214n0:162: Sumbha saṃsumbhane sambha vissāse yabha methune;
anya-e1214n0:170: Damo dame nama name (atho) sama parissame,
anya-e1214n0:171: Yamu uparame nāse ama yāte mu bandhane;
anya-e1214n0:178: Cāya sampūjane tāya santāne pāya vuddhiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n0:181: Tara taraṇasmiṃ thara santharaṇe bhara bharaṇasmiṃ phara sampharaṇe,
anya-e1214n0:182: Sara gati cintā hiṃsā sadde phura calanādo hara haraṇasmiṃ;
anya-e1214n0:184: Ri santatismiṃ ri gate ru sadde khuracchidasmiṃ dhara dhāraṇamhi,
anya-e1214n0:185: Jara jīraṇatthe marapāṇacāge khara sekanāse ghara sevanamhi;
anya-e1214n0:187: Garo nigareṇa seke dara ḍāhe vidāraṇe,
anya-e1214n0:191: Kura kkose nara naye jāgara supinakkhaye;
anya-e1214n0:194: Khala sañcalane phulla vikāse jala dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n0:197: Dala duggatiyaṃ nīla vaṇṇe mīla nimīlane;
anya-e1214n0:212: Ava rakkhaṇe jīva pāṇadhāraṇe (tu) plavo gate;
anya-e1214n0:215: Davo (tu) davane devu devane sevu sevane;
anya-e1214n0:219: Hve avhāne keva seke dhuva yātrā thiresu (ca;);
anya-e1214n0:221: Asa gasa adane ghasa adanasmiṃ-isa pariyese isuicchāyaṃ,
anya-e1214n0:224: Kusa akkose dusa appīte-tusa santose pusa posamhi,
anya-e1214n0:225: Rusa ālepe rusa hiṃsāyaṃ-masu macchere usu dāhe (’pi;)
anya-e1214n0:227: Hasa hasanasmiṃ ghusa saddasmiṃ-tasa ubbege trasa ubbege,
anya-e1214n0:230: Gavesa maggaṇe paṃsa nāsane disa pekkhaṇe,
anya-e1214n0:233: Saṃsa pasaṃsane issa issāyaṃ kassa kassane,
anya-e1214n0:234: Dhaṃsa padhaṃsane siṃsa icchāyaṃ ghaṃsa ghaṃsane;
anya-e1214n0:240: Kisa sāṇe kasa gate kasa hiṃsāvilekhane;
anya-e1214n0:246: Su sadde su pasavane si saye (ca) si sevane;
anya-e1214n0:249: Raha cāgasmiṃ muha mucchāyaṃ-maha sattāyaṃ bahu saṃkhyāne;
anya-e1214n0:252: Ruha sañjanane ūha vitakke vaha pāpaṇe;
anya-e1214n0:255: Nindāyaṃ garaho īha ghaṭṭane miha sevane;
anya-e1214n0:258: Vhe saddamhi hasane hā cāge luḷa manthane
